name: DROPBOX__LIST_FOLDER
description: List files and folders in a Dropbox directory. This allows browsing and discovering content within the user's Dropbox account.

path.description: The path to list (empty string for root folder)

recursive.description: List files recursively in all subfolders

include_media_info.description: Include media metadata for photo and video files

include_deleted.description: Include deleted files in the listing

limit.description: Maximum number of entries to return

name: DROPBOX__LIST_FOLDER_CONTINUE
description: Continue listing files from a previous list_folder request using a cursor. This enables pagination through large directories.

cursor.description: Cursor returned by list_folder or previous list_folder/continue

name: DROPBOX__METADATA
description: Get metadata for a file or folder in Dropbox including size, modification date, and sharing information.

path.description: The path to the file or folder

include_media_info.description: Include media metadata for photo and video files

name: DROPBOX__DOWNLOAD_FILE
description: Download a file from Dropbox. This retrieves the file content for local processing or storage.

name: DROPBOX__UPLOAD_FILE
description: Upload a file to Dropbox. This allows storing content in the user's Dropbox account with optional overwrite settings.

Dropbox-API-Arg.description: JSON string with upload parameters: {"path": "/path/to/file.txt", "mode": "overwrite", "autorename": true}

Content-Type.description: Content type of the file being uploaded

body.description: The file content to upload (binary data)

name: DROPBOX__CREATE_FOLDER
description: Create a new folder in Dropbox for organizing files and content. This allows structuring data within the user's account.

path.description: The path where the folder should be created

autorename.description: Automatically rename if folder already exists

name: DROPBOX__FILE
description: Delete a file or folder from Dropbox. The item is moved to trash and can be restored by the user through the web interface.

path.description: The path to the file or folder to delete

name: DROPBOX__MOVE_FILE
description: Move or rename a file or folder in Dropbox to a new location or name. This allows reorganizing content within the account.

from_path.description: Current path of the file or folder

to_path.description: New path for the file or folder

autorename.description: Automatically rename if destination already exists

name: DROPBOX__COPY_FILE
description: Copy a file or folder in Dropbox to a new location. This creates a duplicate of the content at the specified destination.

from_path.description: Path of the file or folder to copy

autorename.description: Automatically rename if destination already exists

name: DROPBOX__SEARCH_FILES
description: Search for files and folders in Dropbox by name, content, or other criteria. This enables finding content across the entire account.

path.description: Limit search to specific folder path

filename_only.description: Search only in filenames, not file content

name: DROPBOX__CREATE_SHARED_LINK
description: Create a shared link for a file or folder in Dropbox. This generates a URL that can be shared with others for access to the content.

requested_visibility.description: Visibility level for the shared link

expires.description: Expiration date for the shared link (ISO 8601)

access.description: Access level granted by the link

name: DROPBOX__LIST_SHARED_LINKS
description: List shared links created in Dropbox for managing access and permissions to files and folders.

path.description: Filter links by file or folder path (optional)

direct_only.description: Return only direct links to the specified path

name: DROPBOX__REVOKE_SHARED_LINK
description: Revoke a shared link in Dropbox to remove access for anyone who has the URL. This helps manage security and access control.

url.description: The shared link URL to revoke

name: DROPBOX__SHARED_LINK_METADATA
description: Get metadata for a shared link including access permissions, expiration, and file information.

path.description: Specific path within the shared link (for folder links)

name: DROPBOX__LIST_SHARED_FOLDERS
description: List shared folders that the user is a member of in Dropbox. This shows collaborative spaces and team folders.

limit.description: Maximum number of shared folders to return

name: DROPBOX__SHARE_FOLDER
description: Share a folder with other users in Dropbox. This creates collaborative spaces where multiple users can access and edit content.

path.description: Path to the folder to share

member_policy.description: Who can be added as members

actions.description: Available actions for the shared folder

name: DROPBOX__ADD_FOLDER_MEMBER
description: Add a member to a shared folder in Dropbox. This allows inviting users to collaborate on shared content with specified permissions.

members.description: Members to add to the folder

email.description: Email address of the member to add

quiet.description: Don't send email notification to new members

custom_message.description: Custom message to include in invitation email

name: DROPBOX__REMOVE_FOLDER_MEMBER
description: Remove a member from a shared folder in Dropbox. This revokes their access to the shared content.

email.description: Email address of the member to remove

leave_a_copy.description: Allow member to keep a copy of the folder contents

name: DROPBOX__FOLDER_MEMBERS
description: List members of a shared folder in Dropbox including their access levels and permissions.

limit.description: Maximum number of members to return

name: DROPBOX__UPDATE_FOLDER_MEMBER
description: Update a member's access level in a shared folder. This allows changing permissions from viewer to editor or vice versa.

email.description: Email address of the member to update

access_level.description: New access level for the member

name: DROPBOX__SPACE_USAGE
description: Get current space usage information for the Dropbox account including used space, allocated space, and quota details.

name: DROPBOX__CURRENT_ACCOUNT
description: Get information about the current Dropbox user account including name, email, and account type.

name: DROPBOX__CREATE_FILE_REQUEST
description: Create a file request in Dropbox that allows others to upload files to your account through a shared URL without needing a Dropbox account.

destination.description: Dropbox path where uploaded files will be stored

open.description: Whether the file request is open for submissions

description.description: Description of what files are being requested

name: DROPBOX__LIST_FILE_REQUESTS
description: List file requests created in Dropbox for managing incoming file uploads and submissions from external users.

limit.description: Maximum number of file requests to return

name: DROPBOX__FILE_REQUEST_POST_GET
description: Get detailed information about a specific file request including submissions, deadline, and configuration.

name: DROPBOX__UPDATE_FILE_REQUEST
description: Update a file request configuration including title, deadline, and open/closed status for managing file collection workflows.

id.description: ID of the file request to update

title.description: Updated title for the file request

destination.description: Updated destination path for uploaded files

name: DROPBOX__FILE_REQUEST_POST_DELETE
description: Delete a file request from Dropbox. This permanently removes the request and stops accepting new file submissions.

ids.description: Array of file request IDs to delete
